name: Hamster no Odekake
overview: Hamster no Odekake is a simulation game in which the player has 5 different hamsters that live in a small hamster house and he has to take care of them. To do that he can watch them do different activities like eat, sleep or watch the TV (the player can choose the tv channel they will watch). The game uses a lot the Pocketstation since the player choose one of his hamsters to transfer it to the Pocketstation and there that hamster will interact with different things and do different activities that will unlock others in the main game. The player can change the hamster to use in the Pocketstation at any time of the game.
